trans-unit.target: 注意：对于数据写入和数据查询，可接受的布尔语法不同。有关更多信息，请参见常见问题。

trans-unit.source: Note: After hitting enter, a new prompt appears and nothing else is displayed. In the CLI, this means the statement was executed and there were no errors to display. There will always be an error displayed if something went wrong. No news is good news!
trans-unit.target: 注意：按下Enter键后，将出现一个新提示，并且不显示任何其他内容。在CLI中，这意味着该语句已执行，没有错误要显示。如果出现问题，将始终显示错误。没有消息就是好消息！

trans-unit.source: Note: Any existing databases with a series count that exceeds max-series-per-database will continue to accept writes to existing series, but writes that create a new series will fail.
trans-unit.target: 注意：系列计数超过 max-series-per-database 的任何现有数据库将继续接受对现有系列的写入，但是创建新系列的写入将失败。

trans-unit.source: Note: Appending pretty=true to the URL enables pretty-printed JSON output. While this is useful for debugging or when querying directly with tools like curl, it is not recommended for production use as it consumes unnecessary network bandwidth.
trans-unit.target: 注：追加 pretty=true 的URL能够漂亮打印JSON输出。虽然这对于调试或使用 curl 等工具直接查询很有用，但不建议用于生产环境，因为它会消耗不必要的网络带宽。

trans-unit.source: Note: Authentication and authorization should not be relied upon to prevent access and protect data from malicious actors. If additional security or compliance features are desired, InfluxDB should be run behind a third-party service.
trans-unit.target: 注意：不应依赖身份验证和授权来防止访问并保护数据免受恶意行为者的侵害。如果需要其他安全性或合规性功能，则InfluxDB应该在第三方服务之后运行。

trans-unit.source: Note: Authentication only occurs at the HTTP request scope. Plugins do not currently have the ability to authenticate requests and service endpoints (for example, Graphite, collectd, etc.) are not authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 注意：验证仅在HTTP请求范围内进行。插件当前不具有对请求进行身份验证的能力，并且服务端点（例如Graphite，collected等）不经过身份验证。

trans-unit.source: Note: Backups are not interchangeable between OSS InfluxDB and InfluxEnterprise. You cannot restore an OSS backup to an InfluxEnterprise data node, nor can you restore an InfluxEnterprise backup to an OSS instance.
trans-unit.target: 注意： OSS InfluxDB和InfluxEnterprise之间的备份不可互换。您不能将OSS备份还原到InfluxEnterprise数据节点，也不能将InfluxEnterprise备份还原到OSS实例。

trans-unit.source: Note: Because InfluxDB stores tag values as strings, InfluxDB cannot perform math on tag values. In addition, InfluxQL functions do not accept a tag value as a primary argument. It’s a good idea to take into account that information when designing your schema.
trans-unit.target: 注意：由于InfluxDB将标记值存储为字符串，因此InfluxDB无法对标记值执行数学运算。另外，InfluxQL 函数不接受标签值作为主要参数。在设计架构时，最好考虑这些信息。

trans-unit.source: Note: Changes to the [monitor] section in the configuration file may affect query results.
trans-unit.target: 注意：对配置文件中 [monitor] 部分的更改可能会影响查询结果。

trans-unit.source: Note: For how to export data from InfluxDB version 0.8.9, see Exporting from 0.8.9.
trans-unit.target: 注意：有关如何从InfluxDB版本0.8.9导出数据，请参阅从0.8.9导出。

trans-unit.source: Note: For large datasets, influx writes out a status message every 100,000 points. For example:
trans-unit.target: 注意：对于大型数据集， influx 每100,000点写出一条状态消息。例如：

trans-unit.source: Note: Generally, it is not necessary to specify the field value type in the SELECT clause. In most cases, InfluxDB rejects any writes that attempt to write a field value to a field that previously accepted field values of a different type.
trans-unit.target: 注意：通常，没有必要在 SELECT 子句中指定字段值类型。在大多数情况下，InfluxDB拒绝任何试图将字段值写入以前接受其他类型字段值的字段的写入。

trans-unit.source: Note: If a user with ALL privileges has WRITE privileges revoked, they are left with READ privileges, and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果具有 ALL 特权的用户被撤销 WRITE 特权，则他们将具有 READ 特权，反之亦然。

trans-unit.source: Note: If you enable authentication and have no users, InfluxDB will not enforce authentication and will only accept the query that creates a new admin user.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果启用身份验证并且没有用户，则InfluxDB将不强制执行身份验证，并且仅接受创建新admin用户的查询。

trans-unit.source: Note: If you’re using the --basepath option when starting Chronograf, add the same basepath to the callback URL of any OAuth provider that you configure.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果启动Chronograf时使用的是 --basepath 选项，则将相同的基本路径添加到您配置的任何OAuth提供程序的回调URL中。

trans-unit.source: Note: If your data file has more than 5,000 points, it may be necessary to split that file into several files in order to write your data in batches to InfluxDB. By default, the HTTP request times out after five seconds. InfluxDB will still attempt to write the points after that time out but there will be no confirmation that they were successfully written.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果您的数据文件具有超过5,000个点，则可能有必要将该文件拆分为多个文件，以便将数据批量写入InfluxDB。默认情况下，HTTP请求在五秒钟后超时。超时后，InfluxDB仍将尝试写入这些点，但是不会确认它们已成功写入。

trans-unit.source: Note: In InfluxDB, epoch 0 (1970-01-01T00:00:00Z) is often used as a null timestamp equivalent. If you request a query that has no timestamp to return, such as an aggregation function with an unbounded time range, InfluxDB returns epoch 0 as the timestamp.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在InfluxDB中，时期0（ 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z ）通常用作等效的空时间戳。如果您请求没有时间戳的查询返回，例如具有不受限制的时间范围的聚合函数，则InfluxDB返回纪元0作为时间戳。

trans-unit.source: Note: InfluxDB redacts passwords when you enable authentication.
trans-unit.target: 注意：启用身份验证后，InfluxDB会编辑密码。

trans-unit.source: Note: InfluxDB returns no results if the SOFFSET clause paginates through more than the total number of series.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果 SOFFSET 子句分页的次数超过序列总数，则InfluxDB不返回任何结果。

trans-unit.source: Note: InfluxDB returns no results if the WHERE clause includes a time range and the OFFSET clause would cause InfluxDB to return points with timestamps outside of that time range.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果 WHERE 子句包含一个时间范围，并且 OFFSET 子句将导致InfluxDB返回带有该时间范围之外的时间戳的点，则InfluxDB不返回任何结果。

trans-unit.source: Note: InfluxQL supports subqueries which also offer similar functionality to HAVING clauses. See Data Exploration for more information.
trans-unit.target: 注意： InfluxQL支持子查询，这些子查询还提供与 HAVING 子句类似的功能。有关更多信息，请参见数据浏览。

trans-unit.source: Note: InfluxQL supports subqueries which also offer the same functionality as nested functions. See Data Exploration for more information.
trans-unit.target: 注意： InfluxQL支持子查询，这些子查询还提供与嵌套函数相同的功能。有关更多信息，请参见数据浏览。

trans-unit.source: Note: InfluxQL supports using regular expressions when specifying:
trans-unit.target: 注意： InfluxQL支持在指定以下内容时使用正则表达式：

trans-unit.source: Note: It is also recommended that you set name_override to a measurement name that makes sense for your metric, otherwise it will just be set to the name of the plugin.
trans-unit.target: 注意：还建议您将 name_override 设置为对您的指标有意义的度量名称，否则将仅设置为插件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Note: Metastore backups are also included in per-database backups
trans-unit.target: 注意：元数据库备份也包含在每个数据库的备份中

trans-unit.source: Note: More information on the line protocol can be found on the Write Syntax page.
trans-unit.target: 注意：有关线路协议的更多信息，请参见“ 写语法”页面。

trans-unit.source: Note: No data from user databases is ever transmitted.
trans-unit.target: 注意：从未传输过用户数据库中的数据。

trans-unit.source: Note: Note that INF (infinite) is not a valid duration when configuring the shard group duration. As a workaround, specify a 1000w duration to achieve an extremely long shard group duration.
trans-unit.target: 注意：请注意，在配置分片组持续时间时， INF （无限）不是有效持续时间。解决方法是，指定 1000w 的持续时间以实现非常长的分片组持续时间。

trans-unit.source: Note: Notice that the cq_query does not require a time range in a WHERE clause. InfluxDB automatically generates a time range for the cq_query when it executes the CQ. Any user-specified time ranges in the cq_query’s WHERE clause will be ignored by the system.
trans-unit.target: 注意：请注意， cq_query 在 WHERE 子句中不需要时间范围。InfluxDB 在执行CQ时会自动为 cq_query 生成一个时间范围。系统将忽略 cq_query 的 WHERE 子句中任何用户指定的时间范围。

trans-unit.source: Note: Notice that we fully qualify (that is, we use the syntax "<retention_policy>"."<measurement>") the measurement in the INTO clause. InfluxDB requires that syntax to write data to an RP other than the DEFAULT RP.
trans-unit.target: 注意：请注意，我们完全符合 INTO 子句中的度量标准（即，使用语法 "<retention_policy>"."<measurement>" ）。InfluxDB要求使用该语法将数据写入到 DEFAULT RP 以外的RP。

trans-unit.source: Note: On OS X the logs, by default, are stored in the file /usr/local/var/log/influxdb.log
trans-unit.target: 注意：在OS X上，默认情况下，日志存储在文件 /usr/local/var/log/influxdb.log 中

trans-unit.source: Note: Once the backed up data has been recovered, the permissions on the shards may no longer be accurate. To ensure the file permissions are correct, please run:
trans-unit.target: 注意：一旦恢复了备份的数据，分片上的权限可能不再准确。为确保文件权限正确，请运行：

trans-unit.source: Note: Production clusters should not use the SQLite database as it does not allow for redundant Web servers, nor can it handle high loads as gracefully as Postgres.
trans-unit.target: 注意：生产集群不应该使用SQLite数据库，因为它不允许冗余的Web服务器，也不能像Postgres那样优雅地处理高负载。

trans-unit.source: Note: Queries vary widely in their impact on the system.
trans-unit.target: 注意：查询对系统的影响差异很大。

trans-unit.source: Note: Regular expression comparisons are more computationally intensive than exact string comparisons; queries with regular expressions are not as performant as those without.
trans-unit.target: 注意：正则表达式比较比精确的字符串比较在计算上更加密集。使用正则表达式的查询的性能不如不使用正则表达式的查询。

trans-unit.source: Note: Repeating the exact CREATE USER statement is idempotent. If any values change the database will return a duplicate user error. See GitHub Issue #6890 for details.
trans-unit.target: 注意：重复确切的 CREATE USER 语句是幂等的。如果任何值更改，数据库将返回重复的用户错误。有关详细信息，请参见GitHub Issue ＃6890。

trans-unit.source: Note: Restoring from backup is only supported while the InfluxDB daemon is stopped.
trans-unit.target: 注意：仅在InfluxDB守护程序停止时才支持从备份还原。

trans-unit.source: Note: Setting the precision to rfc3339 (-precision rfc3339) works with the -execute option, but it does not work with the -import option. All other precision formats (e.g. h,m,s,ms,u, and ns) work with the -execute and -import options.
trans-unit.target: 注意：将精度设置为 rfc3339 （ -precision rfc3339 ）可与 -execute 选项一起使用，但不适用于 -import option 。所有其他精度格式（例如 h ， m ， s ， ms ， u 和 ns ）都可以使用 -execute 和 -import 选项。

trans-unit.source: Note: Telegraf will start automatically using the default configuration when installed from a deb package.
trans-unit.target: 注意：从deb软件包安装后，Telegraf将使用默认配置自动启动。

trans-unit.source: Note: The _internal database is created and used by InfluxDB to store internal runtime metrics. Check it out later to get an interesting look at how InfluxDB is performing under the hood.
trans-unit.target: 注：该 _internal 数据库中创建和使用InfluxDB存储内部运行指标。稍后进行检查，以有趣地了解InfluxDB的性能如何。

trans-unit.source: Note: The CLI and InfluxDB versions should be identical. If not, it can lead to parsing issues with queries.
trans-unit.target: 注意： CLI和InfluxDB版本应该相同。如果没有，则可能导致解析查询问题。

trans-unit.source: Note: The data in Example 2 are not in NOAA_water_database. We had to create a dataset with less regular data to work with fill(linear).
trans-unit.target: 注意：示例2中的数据不在 NOAA_water_database 中。我们必须使用较少的常规数据创建数据集才能使用 fill(linear) 。

trans-unit.source: Note: The data in Issue 3 are not in NOAA_water_database. We had to create a dataset with less regular data to work with fill(linear).
trans-unit.target: 注意：第3 NOAA_water_database 的数据不在NOAA_water_database中。我们必须使用较少的常规数据创建数据集才能使用 fill(linear) 。

trans-unit.source: Note: The database can also be used by making raw HTTP requests. See Writing Data and Querying Data for examples with the curl application.
trans-unit.target: 注意：也可以通过发出原始HTTP请求来使用数据库。有关 curl 应用程序的示例，请参见写入数据和查询数据。

trans-unit.source: Note: The default directory for OS X installations is /Users/<username>/.influxdb/data
trans-unit.target: 注意： OS X安装的默认目录是/ /Users/<username>/.influxdb/data

trans-unit.source: Note: The default directory for OS X installations is /Users/<username>/.influxdb/meta
trans-unit.target: 注意： OS X安装的默认目录是/ /Users/<username>/.influxdb/meta

trans-unit.source: Note: The field set is not part of the series identification!
trans-unit.target: 注意：该字段集不是系列标识的一部分！

trans-unit.source: Note: The password string must be wrapped in single quotes.
trans-unit.target: 注意：密码字符串必须用单引号引起来。

trans-unit.source: Note: The query in Example 2 returns the same results as the query in Example 1, but the query in Example 2 uses a negative offset_interval instead of a positive offset_interval. There are no performance differences between the two queries; feel free to choose the most intuitive option when deciding between a positive and negative offset_interval.
trans-unit.target: 注意：示例2中的查询返回与示例1中的查询相同的结果，但是示例2中的查询使用负的 offset_interval 而不是正的 offset_interval 。这两个查询之间没有性能差异。在正负 offset_interval 之间进行选择时，可以随意选择最直观的选项。

trans-unit.source: Note: The quoting syntax for queries differs from the line protocol. Please review the rules for single and double-quoting in queries.
trans-unit.target: 注意：查询的引用语法与line protocol不同。请查看查询中单引号和双引号的规则。

trans-unit.source: Note: There’s no need to include a Slack channel in the Alert Message section if you specified a default channel in the initial Slack configuration. If you did not include a default channel in the initial configuration or if you’d like to send alerts to a non-default channel, specify an alternative Slack channel in this section.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果您在初始Slack配置中指定了默认渠道，则无需在 Alert Message 部分中包括Slack渠道。如果您没有在初始配置中包含默认渠道，或者想要将警报发送到非默认渠道，请在本部分中指定备用Slack渠道。

trans-unit.source: Note: This page documents configuration options for the latest official release - the sample configuration file on GitHub will always be slightly ahead of what is documented here.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此页面记录了最新正式发行版的配置选项-GitHub上的示例配置文件将始终比此处记录的文件稍早。

trans-unit.source: Note: To set or override settings in a config section that allows multiple configurations (any section with [[double_brackets]] in the header supports multiple configurations), the desired configuration must be specified by ordinal number. For example, for the first set of [[graphite]] environment variables, prefix the configuration setting name in the environment variable with the relevant position number (in this case: 0):
trans-unit.target: 注意：要在允许多配置的config节中设置或覆盖设置（标头中带有[[ double_brackets ]]的任何节都支持多配置），必须用序号指定所需的配置。例如，对于第一组 [[graphite]] 环境变量，在环境变量中的配置设置名称前加上相关的位置编号（在这种情况下为 0 ）：

trans-unit.source: Note: We did not supply a timestamp when writing our point. When no timestamp is supplied for a point, InfluxDB assigns the local current timestamp when the point is ingested. That means your timestamp will be different.
trans-unit.target: 注意：编写我们的观点时，我们没有提供时间戳。如果没有为某个点提供时间戳，则在摄取该点时，InfluxDB会分配本地当前时间戳。这意味着您的时间戳将有所不同。

trans-unit.source: Note: We set the threshold number to 80 for demonstration purposes. On our machine, setting the threshold for idle CPU usage to a high number ensures that we’ll be able to see the alert in action. In practice, you’d set the threshold number to better match the patterns in your data and your alert needs.
trans-unit.target: 注意：出于演示目的，我们将阈值设置为 80 。在我们的计算机上，将闲置CPU使用量的阈值设置为较高的值可确保我们能够看到运行中的警报。实际上，您可以设置阈值数字以更好地匹配数据中的模式和警报需求。

trans-unit.source: Note: When authentication is enabled, only admin users can execute most of the commands listed on this page. See the documentation on authentication and authorization for more information.
trans-unit.target: 注意：启用身份验证后，只有管理员用户才能执行此页面上列出的大多数命令。有关更多信息，请参见有关身份验证和授权的文档。

trans-unit.source: Note: When we created the food_data database in step 1, InfluxDB automatically generated an RP named autogen and set it as the DEFAULT RP for the database. The autogen RP has an infinite retention period. With the query above, the RP two_hours replaces autogen as the DEFAULT RP for the food_data database.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在步骤1中创建 food_data 数据库时，InfluxDB自动生成一个名为 autogen 的RP ，并将其设置为该数据库的 DEFAULT RP。该 autogen RP具有无限保留期。通过上面的查询，RP two_hours 替换了 autogen 作为 food_data 数据库的 DEFAULT RP 。

trans-unit.source: Note: You can also specify a new retention policy in the CREATE DATABASE query. See Create a database with CREATE DATABASE.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您还可以在 CREATE DATABASE 查询中指定新的保留策略。请参阅使用CREATE DATABASE创建数据库。

trans-unit.source: Note:DROP MEASUREMENT drops all data and series in the measurement. It does not drop the associated continuous queries.
trans-unit.target: 注意： DROP MEASUREMENT 会删除测量中的所有数据和序列。它不会删除关联的连续查询。

trans-unit.source: Note:DROP SERIES does not support time intervals in the WHERE clause. See DELETE for that functionality.
trans-unit.target: 注意： DROP SERIES 在 WHERE 子句中不支持时间间隔。有关该功能，请参见 DELETE 。

trans-unit.source: Note:DROP commands are usually CPU-intensive, as they frequently trigger a TSM compaction. Issuing DROP queries at a high frequency may significantly impact write and other query throughput.
trans-unit.target: 注意： DROP 命令通常会占用大量CPU，因为它们经常触发TSM压缩。频繁发出 DROP 查询可能会严重影响写入和其他查询吞吐量。

trans-unit.source: Note:MEDIAN() is nearly equivalent to PERCENTILE(field_key, 50), except MEDIAN() returns the average of the two middle field values if the field contains an even number of values.
trans-unit.target: 注意： MEDIAN() 几乎等同于 PERCENTILE(field_key, 50) ，但如果该字段包含偶数个值，则 MEDIAN() 返回两个中间字段值的平均值。

trans-unit.source: Note:MODE() returns the field value with the earliest timestamp if there’s a tie between two or more values for the maximum number of occurrences.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果两个或两个以上值之间存在最大关系，则 MODE() 返回带有最早时间戳的字段值。

trans-unit.source: Note:fill(previous) doesn’t fill the result for a time interval if the previous value is outside the query’s time range. See Frequently Asked Questions for more information.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果前一个值超出查询的时间范围，则 fill(previous) 不会在一个时间间隔内填充结果。有关更多信息，请参见常见问题。

trans-unit.source: Note: Scraping and discovery is currently under technical preview. There may be changes to the configuration and behavior in subsequent releases.
trans-unit.target: 注意：搜寻和发现目前处于技术预览之下。在后续版本中，配置和行为可能有所更改。

trans-unit.source: Processor plugins process metrics as they pass through and immediately emit results based on the values they process. For example, this could be printing all metrics or adding a tag to all metrics that pass through.
trans-unit.target: 处理器插件在处理指标时会进行处理，并根据处理的值立即发出结果。例如，这可能是打印所有指标或为通过的所有指标添加标签。

trans-unit.source: Querying Data
trans-unit.target: 查询数据

trans-unit.source: Zoom in on your cell by clicking and dragging your mouse over the area of interest

trans-unit.source: collection_jitter: Collection jitter is used to jitter the collection by a random amount. Each plugin will sleep for a random time within jitter before collecting. This can be used to avoid many plugins querying things like sysfs at the same time, which can have a measurable effect on the system.
trans-unit.target: collection_jitter：集合抖动用于使集合随机抖动。在收集之前，每个插件都会在抖动内随机睡眠一段时间。这样可以避免许多插件同时查询诸如sysfs之类的东西，而这可能会对系统产生可衡量的影响。

trans-unit.source: debug: Run telegraf in debug mode.
trans-unit.target: debug：在调试模式下运行telegraf。

trans-unit.source: delay: The delay before each aggregator is flushed. This is to control how long for aggregators to wait before receiving metrics from input plugins, in the case that aggregators are flushing and inputs are gathering on the same interval.
trans-unit.target: delay：刷新每个聚合器之前的延迟。这是为了控制在聚合器正在刷新并且输入以相同的时间间隔收集的情况下，聚合器在从输入插件接收度量之前等待多长时间。

trans-unit.source: drop_original: If true, the original metric will be dropped by the aggregator and will not get sent to the output plugins.
trans-unit.target: drop_original：如果为true，则原始指标将被聚合器删除，并且不会发送到输出插件。

trans-unit.source: fielddrop: The inverse of fieldpass. Fields with a field key matching one of the patterns will be discarded from the point. Not available for outputs.
trans-unit.target: fielddrop：场通的逆 fieldpass 。具有与其中一种模式匹配的字段关键字的字段将从该点被丢弃。不适用于输出。

trans-unit.source: fieldpass: An array of glob pattern strings. Only fields whose field key matches a pattern in this list are emitted. Not available for outputs.
trans-unit.target: fieldpass：全局模式字符串的数组。仅发射其字段关键字与该列表中的模式匹配的字段。不适用于输出。

trans-unit.source: flush_interval: Default data flushing interval for all outputs. You should not set this below interval. Maximum flush_interval will be flush_interval + flush_jitter
trans-unit.target: flush_interval：所有输出的默认数据刷新间隔。您不应该在间隔以下设置此时间。最大flush_interval将为flush_interval + flush_jitter

trans-unit.source: flush_jitter: Jitter the flush interval by a random amount. This is primarily to avoid large write spikes for users running a large number of telegraf instances. ie, a jitter of 5s and flush_interval 10s means flushes will happen every 10-15s.
trans-unit.target: flush_jitter：将刷新间隔抖动一个随机量。这主要是为了避免为运行大量telegraf实例的用户带来较大的写峰值。即，抖动为5s，flush_interval为10s，则意味着每10-15s就会发生一次刷新。

trans-unit.source: hostname: Override default hostname, if empty use os.Hostname().
trans-unit.target: hostname：覆盖默认主机名，如果为空，则使用os.Hostname（）。

trans-unit.source: interval: Default data collection interval for all inputs
trans-unit.target: interval：所有输入的默认数据收集间隔

trans-unit.source: interval: How often to gather this metric. Normal plugins use a single global interval, but if one particular input should be run less or more often, you can configure that here.
trans-unit.target: interval：多久收集一次该指标。普通插件使用单个全局时间间隔，但是如果一个特定的输入应该运行得更少或更频繁，则可以在此处进行配置。

trans-unit.source: logfile: Specify the log file name. The empty string means to log to stderr.
trans-unit.target: logfile：指定日志文件名。空字符串表示登录到stderr。

trans-unit.source: metric_batch_size: Telegraf will send metrics to output in batch of at most metric_batch_size metrics.
trans-unit.target: metric_batch_size：Telegraf将最多以metric_batch_size度量为单位将度量发送到输出。

trans-unit.source: metric_buffer_limit: Telegraf will cache metric_buffer_limit metrics for each output, and will flush this buffer on a successful write. This should be a multiple of metric_batch_size and could not be less than 2 times metric_batch_size.
trans-unit.target: metric_buffer_limit：Telegraf将为每个输出缓存metric_buffer_limit指标，并在成功写入时刷新此缓冲区。这应该是metric_batch_size的倍数，并且不能小于metric_batch_size的2倍。

trans-unit.source: name_override: Override the base name of the measurement. (Default is the name of the input).
trans-unit.target: name_override：覆盖度量的基本名称。（默认为输入名称）。

trans-unit.source: name_prefix: Specifies a prefix to attach to the measurement name.
trans-unit.target: name_prefix：指定要附加到度量名称的前缀。

trans-unit.source: name_suffix: Specifies a suffix to attach to the measurement name.
trans-unit.target: name_suffix：指定要附加到度量名称的后缀。

trans-unit.source: namedrop: The inverse of namepass. If a match is found the point is discarded. This is tested on points after they have passed the namepass test.
trans-unit.target: namedrop：的逆 namepass 。如果找到匹配项，则丢弃该点。在通过名称通过测试的点上 namepass 测试。

trans-unit.source: namepass: An array of glob pattern strings. Only points whose measurement name matches a pattern in this list are emitted.
trans-unit.target: namepass：glob模式字符串的数组。仅发射其测量名称与该列表中的模式匹配的点。

trans-unit.source: omit_hostname: If true, do no set the “host” tag in the telegraf agent.
trans-unit.target: omit_hostname：如果为true，则不要在telegraf代理中设置“ host”标签。

trans-unit.source: order: This is the order in which the processor(s) get executed. If this is not specified then processor execution order will be random.
trans-unit.target: order：这是处理器执行的顺序。如果未指定，则处理器执行顺序将是随机的。

trans-unit.source: period: The period on which to flush & clear each aggregator. All metrics that are sent with timestamps outside of this period will be ignored by the aggregator.
trans-unit.target: period：冲洗并清除每个聚合器的时间段。聚合器将忽略在此时间段之外使用时间戳发送的所有度量。

trans-unit.source: precision: By default, precision will be set to the same timestamp order as the collection interval, with the maximum being 1s. Precision will NOT be used for service inputs, such as logparser and statsd. Valid values are “ns”, “us” (or “µs”), “ms”, “s”.
trans-unit.target: precision：默认情况下，精度将设置为与收集间隔相同的时间戳顺序，最大值为1s。Precision不会用于服务输入，例如logparser和statsd。有效值为“ ns”，“ us”（或“ µs”），“ ms”，“ s”。

trans-unit.source: quiet: Run telegraf in quiet mode (error messages only).
trans-unit.target: quiet：在安静模式下运行telegraf（仅错误消息）。

trans-unit.source: round_interval: Rounds collection interval to ‘interval’ ie, if interval=“10s” then always collect on :00, :10, :20, etc.
trans-unit.target: round_interval：将收集间隔四舍五入为“ interval”，即，如果interval =“ 10s”，则始终以：00，：10，：20等进行收集。

trans-unit.source: tagdrop: The inverse of tagpass. If a match is found the point is discarded. This is tested on points after they have passed the tagpass test.
trans-unit.target: tagdrop：tagpass的逆 tagpass 。如果找到匹配项，则丢弃该点。在点通过 tagpass 通过测试之后，将对它们进行测试。

trans-unit.source: tagexclude: The inverse of taginclude. Tags with a tag key matching one of the patterns will be discarded from the point.
trans-unit.target: tagexclude：taginclude的逆 taginclude 。标记键与模式之一匹配的标记将从该点丢弃。

trans-unit.source: taginclude: An array of glob pattern strings. Only tags with a tag key matching one of the patterns are emitted. In contrast to tagpass, which will pass an entire point based on its tag, taginclude removes all non matching tags from the point. This filter can be used on both inputs & outputs, but it is recommended to be used on inputs, as it is more efficient to filter out tags at the ingestion point.
trans-unit.target: taginclude：glob模式字符串的数组。仅发出具有与其中一种模式匹配的标签键的标签。与 tagpass 相比，tagpass将基于其标签传递整个点，而 taginclude 会从该点删除所有不匹配的标签。该过滤器可以在输入和输出上使用，但建议在输入上使用，因为在提取点过滤出标签的效率更高。

trans-unit.source: tagpass: A table mapping tag keys to arrays of glob pattern strings. Only points that contain a tag key in the table and a tag value matching one of its patterns is emitted.
trans-unit.target: tagpass：将标签键映射到全局模式字符串数组的表。仅发射在表中包含标签键并且其值与其模式之一匹配的点。

trans-unit.source: tags: A map of tags to apply to a specific input’s measurements.
trans-unit.target: 标签：适用于特定输入的测量值的标签图。

trans-unit.source: A FromNode selects a subset of the data flowing through a StreamNode. The stream node allows you to select which portion of the stream you want to process.
trans-unit.target: 甲FROMNODE选择流过的数据的子集StreamNode。流节点允许您选择要处理的流的哪一部分。

trans-unit.source: A GroupByNode will group the incoming data. Each group is then processed independently for the rest of the pipeline. Only tags that are dimensions in the grouping will be preserved; all other tags are dropped.
trans-unit.target: 甲GroupByNode意愿组传入的数据。然后，对其余的管道分别处理每个组。仅保留分组中属于维度的标签；所有其他标签均被删除。

trans-unit.source: A QueryNode defines a source and a schedule for processing batch data. The data is queried from an InfluxDB database and then passed into the data pipeline.
trans-unit.target: 甲QueryNode限定了源和用于处理批数据的时间表。从InfluxDB数据库中查询数据，然后将其传递到数据管道中。

trans-unit.source: A StatsNode emits internal statistics about the another node at a given interval.
trans-unit.target: 甲StatsNode发出关于在给定时间间隔的另一节点内部的统计信息。

trans-unit.source: A StreamNode represents the source of data being streamed to Kapacitor via any of its inputs. The stream variable in stream tasks is an instance of a StreamNode.StreamNode.From is the method/property of this node.
trans-unit.target: 甲StreamNode表示数据的存在的源通过任何其输入分流到Kapacitor。流任务中的 stream 变量是StreamNode的一个实例。StreamNode.From是此节点的方法/属性。

trans-unit.source: A UDFNode is a node that can run a User Defined Function (UDF) in a separate process.
trans-unit.target: 甲UDFNode是，可以运行在单独的进程一用户定义函数（UDF）的节点。

trans-unit.source: A server is provided for this purpose, which expects an implementation of the Accepter interface:
trans-unit.target: 为此提供了一个 server ，该服务器期望实现 Accepter 接口：

trans-unit.source: A task in Kapacitor represents an amount of work to do on a set of data. There are two types of tasks, stream and batch tasks. We will be using a stream task first, and next we will do the same thing with a batch task.
trans-unit.target: Kapacitor中的 task 表示要处理一组数据的大量工作。任务有两种类型， stream 任务和 batch 任务。我们将首先使用 stream 任务，然后对 batch 任务执行相同的操作。

trans-unit.source: A window node caches data within a moving time range. The period property of window defines the time range covered by window.
trans-unit.target: 甲 window 节点的运动时间范围内缓存的数据。 window 的 period 属性定义 window 所覆盖的时间范围。

trans-unit.source: A Continuous Query (CQ) is an InfluxQL query that runs automatically and periodically within a database. CQs require a function in the SELECT clause and must include a GROUP BY time() clause.
trans-unit.target: 甲连续查询（CQ）是在数据库中自动地和周期性运行的InfluxQL查询。CQ在 SELECT 子句中需要一个函数，并且必须包含 GROUP BY time() 子句。

trans-unit.source: A Retention Policy (RP) is the part of InfluxDB’s data structure that describes for how long InfluxDB keeps data. InfluxDB compares your local server’s timestamp to the timestamps on your data and deletes data that are older than the RP’s DURATION. A single database can have several RPs and RPs are unique per database.
trans-unit.target: 一个保留策略（RP）是描述InfluxDB多久保留数据InfluxDB的数据结构的一部分。InfluxDB将本地服务器的时间戳与数据上的时间戳进行比较，并删除早于RP的 DURATION 的数据。一个数据库可以有多个RP，每个数据库的RP是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: A HipChat API access token for sending notifications. The following steps describe how to create the API access token:
trans-unit.target: 一个用于发送通知的HipChat API访问令牌。以下是创建API访问令牌的步骤。

trans-unit.source: A Kapacitor task is enabled that uses the UDF and Kapacitor makes a new connection to the socket.
trans-unit.target: 启用了一个使用UDF的Kapacitor任务,Kapacitor会对socket进行一个新的连接。

trans-unit.source: A Real-World Example
trans-unit.target: 一个真实的例子

trans-unit.source: A TSM file is composed of four sections: header, blocks, index, and footer.
trans-unit.target: 一个TSM文件由四个部分组成:页眉、块、索引和页脚。

trans-unit.source: A UDF communicates with Kapacitor via a protocol buffer request/response system. We provide implementations of that communication layer in both Go and Python. Since the other example used Python we will use the Go version here.
trans-unit.target: UDF通过协议缓冲区请求/响应系统与Kapacitor进行通信。我们提供了该通信层在Go和Python中的实现。由于另一个例子使用了Python,我们将在这里使用Go版本。

trans-unit.source: A UDF is a custom script or binary that can communicate via Kapacitor's UDF RPC protocol. The path and arguments to the UDF program are specified in Kapacitor's configuration. Using TICKscripts you can invoke and configure your UDF for each task.
trans-unit.target: UDF是一个自定义的脚本或二进制文件,可以通过Kapacitor的UDF RPC协议进行通信。UDF程序的路径和参数在Kapacitor的配置中指定。使用TICKscripts,您可以为每个任务调用和配置您的UDF。

trans-unit.source: A UDF is a user defined function that can communicate with Kapacitor to process data. Kapacitor will send it data and the UDF can respond with new or modified data. A UDF can be written in any language that has protocol buffer support.
trans-unit.target: UDF是用户定义的功能，可以与Kapacitor通信以处理数据。Kapacitor将发送数据，UDF可以使用新的或修改的数据进行响应。UDF可用支持协议缓冲区的任何语言编写。

trans-unit.source: A brief explanation of InfluxDB’s core architecture useful for new beginners.
trans-unit.target: 简要说明InfluxDB的核心体系结构对新手很有用。

trans-unit.source: A brief treatment of some of the performance tradeoffs made during the design phase of InfluxDB
trans-unit.target: 简单处理一下InfluxDB设计阶段的一些性能权衡。

trans-unit.source: A cluster must have at least three independent meta nodes to survive the loss of a server. A cluster with 2n + 1 meta nodes can tolerate the loss of n meta nodes. Clusters should have an odd number of meta nodes. There is no reason to have an even number of meta nodes, and it can lead to issues in certain configurations.
trans-unit.target: 群集必须至少具有三个独立的元节点，才能在服务器丢失的情况下幸免。具有 2n + 1 元节点的群集可以容忍 n 个元节点的丢失。群集应具有奇数个元节点。没有理由拥有偶数个元节点，这可能导致某些配置出现问题。

trans-unit.source: A cluster with only one data node is valid but has no data redundancy. The redundancy is set by the replication factor on the retention policy to which the data is written. A cluster can lose n - 1 data nodes and still return complete query results, where n is the replication factor. For optimal data distribution within the cluster, InfluxData recommends using an even number of data nodes.
trans-unit.target: 只有一个数据节点的群集有效，但没有数据冗余。冗余由写入数据的保留策略上的复制因子设置。群集可能会丢失 n - 1 数据节点，并且仍会返回完整的查询结果，其中 n 是复制因子。为了在群集内实现最佳的数据分发，InfluxData建议使用偶数个数据节点。

trans-unit.source: A collection of points in line protocol format, separated by newlines (0x0A). A batch of points may be submitted to the database using a single HTTP request to the write endpoint. This makes writes via the HTTP API much more performant by drastically reducing the HTTP overhead. InfluxData recommends batch sizes of 5,000-10,000 points, although different use cases may be better served by significantly smaller or larger batches.
trans-unit.target: 线协议格式的点的集合，以换行符（ 0x0A ）分隔。使用对写入端点的单个HTTP请求，可以将一批点提交到数据库。通过大大减少HTTP开销，这使得通过HTTP API进行写入的性能更高。 InfluxData建议批量大小为5,000-10,000点，尽管不同的用例可以通过较小或较大的批次更好地满足。

trans-unit.source: A default Telegraf config file can be auto-generated by telegraf:
trans-unit.target: 默认的Telegraf配置文件可以由telegraf自动生成。

trans-unit.source: A defect was identified in the way that continuous queries were previously handling time ranges. The result of that defect is that for certain time scales larger than 1d, the continuous queries had their time ranges miscalculated and were run at the incorrect time.
trans-unit.target: 在连续查询以前处理时间范围的方式中发现了一个缺陷。该缺陷的结果是,对于某些大于1d的时间尺度,连续查询的时间范围计算错误,并在错误的时间运行。

trans-unit.source: A deprecated measurement of the rate at which data are persisted to InfluxDB. The schema allows and even encourages the recording of multiple metric vales per point, rendering points per second ambiguous.
trans-unit.target: 废弃的数据持久化到InfluxDB的速度的测量方法。该模式允许甚至鼓励记录每个点的多个度量值,从而使每秒的点数变得模糊不清。

trans-unit.source: A failed response looks like:
trans-unit.target: 失败的反应是这样的。

trans-unit.source: A fresh install of InfluxDB has no databases (apart from the system _internal), so creating one is our first task. You can create a database with the CREATE DATABASE <db-name> InfluxQL statement, where <db-name> is the name of the database you wish to create. Names of databases can contain any unicode character as long as the string is double-quoted. Names can also be left unquoted if they contain only ASCII letters, digits, or underscores and do not begin with a digit.
trans-unit.target: 全新安装的InfluxDB没有数据库（系统 _internal 除外），因此创建数据库是我们的首要任务。您可以使用 CREATE DATABASE <db-name> InfluxQL语句创建数据库，其中 <db-name> 是您要创建的数据库的名称。数据库名称可以包含任何unicode字符，只要该字符串被双引号引起来即可。如果名称仅包含ASCII字母，数字或下划线并且不以数字开头，则也可以不加引号。

trans-unit.source: A group by time offset is also possible.
trans-unit.target: 也可以按时间偏移进行分组。

trans-unit.source: A handler definition has a few properties:
trans-unit.target: 一个处理程序定义有几个属性。

trans-unit.source: A handler takes action on incoming alert events for a specific topic. Each handler operates on exactly one topic.
trans-unit.target: 处理程序对特定主题的传入警报事件采取行动。每个处理程序仅对一个主题进行操作。

trans-unit.source: A introductory guide to reading and writing time series data using InfluxDB.
trans-unit.target: 使用InfluxDB读取和写入时间序列数据的入门指南。

trans-unit.source: A list of InfluxDB terms and their definitions.
trans-unit.target: InfluxDB术语及其定义的列表。

trans-unit.source: A list of services that can be tested is available at the /kapacitor/v1/service-tests endpoint
trans-unit.target: /kapacitor/v1/service-tests 端点上提供了可以测试的服务列表。

trans-unit.source: A list of var objects. Currently lists may only contain string or star vars
trans-unit.target: 一个var对象的列表。目前列表只能包含字符串或星形变量。

trans-unit.source: A logical container for users, retention policies, continuous queries, and time series data.
trans-unit.target: 用户、保留策略、连续查询和时间序列数据的逻辑容器。

trans-unit.source: A machine, virtual or physical, that is running InfluxDB. There should only be one InfluxDB process per server.
trans-unit.target: 一个正在运行InfluxDB的机器,无论是虚拟的还是物理的。每个服务器只能有一个InfluxDB进程。

trans-unit.source: A match expression is a TICKscript lambda expression. The data that triggered the alert is available to the match expression, including all fields and tags.
trans-unit.target: 匹配表达式是一个 TICKscript lambda 表达式。触发警报的数据可用于匹配表达式,包括所有字段和标记。

trans-unit.source: A multi-line comment begins with /* and ends with */. This comment type can span several lines. Multi-line comments do not support nested multi-line comments.
trans-unit.target: 多行注释以 /* 开头，以 */ 结束。此注释类型可以跨越几行。多行注释不支持嵌套多行注释。
